question: Who has been recommended to the post of Chairman of SBI by the Bank Board Bureau?
explanation:
Dinesh Kumar Khara has been recommended as the next Chairman of State Bank of India by Banks Board Bureau (BBB).
Dinesh Kumar Khara was instrumental in successfully completing the merger of SBI with its 5 associate Banks and with Bhartiya Mahila Bank. Presently, he is the Managing Director of SBI and prior to it, he was the chief executive of SBI Funds Management Pvt Limited.
